timeline.message:
HotColdLocation: Center some location spots

Center some hot-cold locations as reported and verified from the mega
issue.

Ref: runelite/runelite#9601

timeline.bodyText: Based on the image, I'm not sure this location description remains accurate with the centered location.
timeline.author: makingcomment
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -83,47 +83,47 @@

 	FREMENNIK_PROVINCE_KELGADRIM_ENTRANCE(new WorldPoint(2715, 3689, 0), FREMENNIK_PROVINCE, "West of the Keldagrim entrance mine."),

replies.bodyText: Good point, I'll update that accordingly.
replies.author: Nightfirecat
